author: Staff Reporter
text:
A seven-year-old boy was killed in an explosion here in Denkanikottai on Tuesday.

The victim Shaheed, son of Kadher, was playing with his friends in Venangur village on Tuesday night, when explosives detonated in a quarry in the vicinity caused the fatal accident.

According to the police, one of the unexploded gelatine sticks fell on the spot where the children were playing. The victim reportedly picked up the gelatine stick out of curiosity, when it exploded in his face critically injuring him and killing him on the spot. The body of Shaheed was taken to his house by his family members without informing the police. However, on Wednesday, Denkanikottai police after an alert secured the body for autopsy at Denkanikottai government hospital.

An inquiry is underway on the incident. Shaheed was studying in class two at the Panchayat Union Elementary School in Venganur.
title: Boy killed as gelatine stick explodes
